Question
========

A specially designed die contains 5 orange faces and 1 green plane. All faces have an equal probability of occurrence and all successive rolls are independent of each other. Which of the rows below is the most likely?

Answerlist
----------

* GGGOG
* GGOOG
* OGOO
* OOOGG

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

* GGOG: Incorrect
* GGOOG: Incorrect
* OGOO: Correct
* OOOGG: Incorrect
